rows.label: qst002501_msg0001
rows.name:
Pleasure to meet friends.
Me is Fumufumu, researcher of history.

rows.label: qst002501_msg0002
rows.name:
Dream of Fumufumu is to visit all
historical architecture of Luxuria!

rows.label: qst002501_msg0003
rows.name:
And this partner of Fumufumu, avid
climber of cliffs and ruin walls!

rows.label: qst002501_msg0004
rows.name: Hi, I'm Mylak.

rows.label: qst002501_msg0005
rows.name:
I'm not really interested in history
or any of that. I just like finding
new things to climb.

rows.label: qst002501_msg0006
rows.name:
Anyway, we both came here to
check out these sweet ruins.

rows.label: qst002501_msg0007
rows.name: Did friends know this?

rows.label: qst002501_msg0008
rows.name:
Current capital of Luxuria, Teos Aure,
positioned right at top of Divine Beast Genbu.
Right next to upper wall.

rows.label: qst002501_msg0009
rows.name:
But long time ago, Luxuria people
live lower down, in Genbu Drifts.

rows.label: qst002501_msg0010
rows.name:
Monsters and Cloud Sea effects slowly
drive living space further up.

rows.label: qst002501_msg0011
rows.name: So people live in these ruins too once!

rows.label: qst002501_msg0012
rows.name:
Probably lots of thousand years
ago though.

rows.label: qst002501_msg0013
rows.name:
You talk too much, Fumufumu. Can we
just head to the next wall already?

rows.label: qst002501_msg0014
rows.name: Mylak shoosh and listen!

rows.label: qst002501_msg0015
rows.name:
Sometimes Fumufumu not know why
hang out with musclebrain man...
Mylak not appreciate ruins properly!

rows.label: qst002501_msg0016
rows.name:
Well, no, I don't really get what's so
special about them. So can we head
on to the next wall now?

rows.label: qst002501_msg0017
rows.name:
Fumufumu get angry now! No more ruin
exploring with silly climbing man!

rows.label: qst002501_msg0018
rows.name:
Hah, well that's fine by me.
How're you going to make it up
these walls on your own, though?

rows.label: qst002501_msg0019
rows.name:
Did you learn to climb by yourself
while you were riding on my backpack
all this time?

rows.label: qst002501_msg0020
rows.name:
Hah! Wall climbing too easy!
Mylak just watch!

rows.label: qst002501_msg0021
rows.name: Ah...

rows.label: qst002501_msg0022
rows.name: Meh-meeeeeehhhhhh!

rows.label: qst002501_msg0023
rows.name: Humhuuuum!

rows.label: qst002501_msg0024
rows.name:
Urgh... Right into the middle of those
monsters! We have to go and help!

rows.label: qst002501_msg0025
rows.name:
But I'm no good for anything but
climbing... How am I meant to make it
through a whole pack of those things...?

rows.label: qst002501_msg0026
rows.name:
Thanks... I really owe you one.
Please make sure Fumufumu is safe!
